attributes.contentHtml: At this point I think you lost your brain cells, you blocked dchu from spa for a disagreement. We could all tell something was wrong with you and you were gonna do something, do you think that were all brain dead? You didn't have complete permissions for a reason. The only reason you had SPA was to manage a minecraft server, that's it.

attributes.title: Zachery#8732 | posting user datas to public community | blocking spa

attributes.contentHtml: IoNetty disagreement? you do realise he could make a account from terminal and unblock himself?Unless you consider me to be stupid i dont see how you could think its because of that but ok
